sentence.Network_en: She shot to stardom on Broadway in a Noel Coward play.
sentence.Network_cn: 她因在百老汇出演了一部诺埃尔·科沃德的戏一炮而红。

sentence.Network_en: He's a coward and a bully who confuses physical strength with manhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是一个懦夫，一个分不清蛮力和大丈夫气概的恃强凌弱者。

sentence.Network_en: "You're a coward," Mark said very plainly and soberly.
sentence.Network_cn: 马克非常直率而严肃地说：“你是个懦夫。”

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语四级词汇（整理版，16页，可直接打印） - 豆丁网 ... cow n. 母牛，奶牛；母兽 coward n. 懦夫；胆怯者 crack n. 裂缝，裂纹.
Angry Editor ... 吸血鬼–  vampire 胆小鬼– coward;chicken 短命鬼–  someone who dies at a young age.
阿拉伯语手册6 - nizi73224的日志 - 网易博客 ... 勇敢的 brave 胆小的 coward 有礼貌的 polite.
《Friends》词汇表B ... manicurist n. 指甲修饰师 coward n. 懦弱的人, 胆小的人 bidder n. 出价人, 投标人.

list.abs: True , Tommy is a miserable coward deserves to die ., 汤姆的确是个卑鄙的懦夫 , 死有余辜.
...(Larry Lenhart)和营销副总裁安德鲁.考沃德(Andrew Coward)就此接受媒体采访，讨论报告内容、公司产品功能以及如何应对法律纠 …
But base and crafty cowards , are like the arrow that flieth in the dark ., 不过卑怯而狡猾的懦夫则往往想要暗中施放的冷箭.
The newspapers had unjustly labeled him as a coward ., 报界不公正地把他描绘成一个胆小鬼.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French couard, based on Latin cauda 'tail', possibly with reference to a frightened animal with its tail between its legs, reflected in sense 2 (early 16th cent.)

encyclopedia.content: 英文单词 名词n. 1. 懦夫，胆怯者[C] Only a coward would run from danger. 只有懦夫才临危脱逃。 形容词a. 1. 懦怯的，胆小的 There was a coward silence when the stern principal came in. 严厉的校长走进来时，大家胆怯得不敢出声。 歌手专辑 《Coward》为歌手ENDLICHERI☆ENDLICHERI 在2006年03月01日发行的专辑，也是堂本刚作为ENDLICHERI☆ENDLICHERI名义发行的首张专辑 。 专辑中文名: Coward 歌手: 堂本刚(tsuyoshi do

entry.def: If you call someone a coward, you disapprove of them because they are easily frightened and avoid dangerous or difficult situations.

example.ex: She accused her husband of being a coward.

means.word_mean: 1. a person who shows fear or timidity

stems_affixes.word_buile: lag拖延,落后+ard不好的人→laggard缓慢的,落后的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 私生子;杂种;讨厌鬼;[俚]家伙;假冒品
stems_affixes.word_buile: bast愿意为结婚,后指不结婚而同居+ard不好的人→没结婚而生出来得的→私生子;杂种
cow威吓+ard不好的人→n.懦夫,胆怯者
drunk喝醉了的+ard不好的人→n.醉汉;酒鬼
lag拖延,落后+ard不好的人→laggard缓慢的,落后的人
nigg=niggle小气地做事+ard不好的人→n.吝啬鬼
slugg鼻涕虫[一种爬得很慢得虫];偷懒+ard不好的人→n.懒鬼

sentences.en: I was basically a dreadful coward.
sentences.cn: 从根本上说, 我非常胆小怕事。
